summary:
This is one part of the \"Balanced Crafting Project\" mod.
This part only balances the Enchanting skill tree and perks.
Enchanting is seriously overpowerd in vanilla.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]NOTICE:
 Please use the \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10521]ACE - Crafting[/url]\" mod instead of this mod!
 * http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10521 *
This mod will not receive regular updates. [/b][/center]


 This is just one part of that mod which only balances the Enchanting skill tree and perks and fixes the fortify potions problem.
 The full mod also balances the tempering and the smithing skill tree and perks.
 This part is here in case there are conflicts with the full mod but you still want to use some of the features.

[color=008000][size=4][b]What this Mod does[/b][/size][/color]
[color=008080][size=3][b] Enchanting[/b][/size][/color]
- Enchanter: 10% / 20% / 30%
- Elemental Enchanter: 10% / 20% (It combines fire, frost, and shock into one enchant)
- Insightful Enchanter: 20% at lvl 30
- Corpus Enchanter: 20% at lvl 70
- Magic Anticipation: 10% / 15% magic resistance
- Partial Duality: 2 enchants at 1/2 power (these 3 \"duality\" perks expand on \"Extra Effect\"
- Mutual Duality: 2 enchants at 3/4 power
- Symbiotic Duality: 2 enchants at full power
- Fortify Alchemy & Smithing enchantment: max 5%
[color=008080][size=3][b] Potions[/b][/size][/color]
- Fortify Restoration / Enchanting / Smithing potions: no longer craftable, but can be found

[color=008080][size=3][b] Results at maxed trees[/b][/size][/color]
- Base enchant modifier 30% (vanilla 100%)
- Fire/Frost/Shock 30%+20% (vanilla 100%+25%)
- Health/Stamina/Magika 30%+20% (vanilla 100%+25%)
- Skill enchants 30%+20% (vanilla 100%+25%)
- +15% magic resistance

[color=008000][size=4][b]What this Mod does[/b][/size][/color]
 - Vanilla is easy to exploit, this mod is not.
 - Playing with this mod means you can max out the skill trees and still play a balanced game!
 - Item drops and loot can give better enchantments, it makes looting worthwhile again!


[color=008000][size=4][b]For Existing Characters[/b][/size][/color]
* To people adding this mod mid-game. All your perks will transfer smoothly. 
* I strongly recommend making a new set of armor after installing this mod!
* Your old potions and gear will still have their enchants unchanged on them.

[color=008000][size=5][b]Change Log[/b][/size][/color]
- V3 - Extra Effect split into 3 perks, progressively, fixed potion exploit, improved mid-game compatibility
- V0.2 - Reduced \"Enchanter\" to 3 levels instead of 5
- V0.1 - the original file

[color=008000][size=5][b]Mod Recommendations[/b][/size][/color]
Using this mod with my other Balance mods gives a fully, truly balanced game.
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10521]Balanced Crafting Project - Enchanting Smithing Alchemy[/url] *
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10634]Balanced Armor Effects - Heavy and Light Perks[/url] *
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11076]Balanced Weapon Skill Perks[/url] *
I strongly recommend using these three together.

If you use bows you may also like my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]Improved Archery and Bows[/url] mod :)
author: Athyra
